content: As stated in my other Balletcrypto wallet threads, it is indeed that time of year! With all the conferences happening there are quite a few different balletcrypto wallets popping up!This one is from the MIT Bitcoin Expo 2023 that was in Cambridge, MA on April 22-23, 2023Price is $35 and will include free shipping to you or to minerjones for consolidation if you so choose.I will place the order on May 11th 2023 sometime after 10pm ESTpayment can be sent in any of the following methods:BTC:  bc1qv8a9a6dkcdluw33mzasakxwvkt5m8u8tteh2rsStrike:  strike.me/moparminingllcand if you want a LN invoice just shoot me a DM.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: one day remaining to add to the group buy - for those that have not paid, please do so. See OP for pymt methods.
